data.name: XReportControlFormat
desc: specifies a format condition for a control.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: CharAutoKerning
desc: optional property to determine whether the kerning tables from the current font are used.
Automatic kerning applies a spacing in between certain pairs of characters to make the text look better.

properties.name: CharCaseMap
desc: optional property which contains the value of the case-mapping of the text for formatting and displaying.

properties.name: CharColor
desc: specifies the text color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: CharCombineIsOn
desc: determines whether text is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombinePrefix and CharCombineSuffix.

properties.name: CharCombinePrefix
desc: contains the prefix (usually parenthesis) before text that is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombineIsOn and CharCombineSuffix.

properties.name: CharCombineSuffix
desc: contains the suffix (usually parenthesis) after text that is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombineIsOn and CharCombinePrefix.

properties.name: CharContoured
desc: specifies if the characters are formatted and displayed with a contour effect.

properties.name: CharEmphasis
desc: contains the font emphasis value as com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis.

properties.name: CharEscapement
desc: specifies the percentage by which to raise/lower superscript/subscript characters.
Negative values denote subscripts and positive values superscripts.

properties.name: CharEscapementHeight
desc: This is the additional height used for subscript or superscript characters in units of percent.
For subscript characters the value is negative and for superscript characters positive.

properties.name: CharFlash
desc: If this optional property is TRUE, then the characters are flashing.

properties.name: CharFontCharSet
desc: This attribute contains the text encoding of the font as specified in com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

properties.name: CharFontCharSetAsian
desc: This property contains the text encoding of the font as specified in com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

properties.name: CharFontCharSetComplex
desc: This property contains the text encoding of the font as specified in com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

properties.name: CharFontFamily
desc: This attribute contains font family as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily .

properties.name: CharFontFamilyAsian
desc: This property contains font family as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily .

properties.name: CharFontFamilyComplex
desc: This property contains font family as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily .

properties.name: CharFontName
desc: This attribute specifies the name of the font style.
It may contain more than one name separated by comma.

properties.name: CharFontNameAsian
desc: This property specifies the name of the font style.
It may contain more than one name separated by comma.

properties.name: CharFontNameComplex
desc: This property specifies the name of the font style.
It may contain more than one name separated by comma.

properties.name: CharFontPitch
desc: This attribute contains the font pitch as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

properties.name: CharFontPitchAsian
desc: This property contains the font pitch as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

properties.name: CharFontPitchComplex
desc: This property contains the font pitch as specified in com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

properties.name: CharFontStyleName
desc: This attribute contains the name of the font style.
This attribute may be empty.

properties.name: CharFontStyleNameAsian
desc: This property contains the name of the font style.
This property may be empty.

properties.name: CharFontStyleNameComplex
desc: This property contains the name of the font style.
This property may be empty.

properties.name: CharHeight
desc: This value contains the height of the characters in point.

properties.name: CharHeightAsian
desc: This value contains the height of the characters in point.

properties.name: CharHeightComplex
desc: This value contains the height of the characters in point.

properties.name: CharHidden
desc: If this optional property is TRUE, then the characters are invisible.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: CharKerning
desc: optional property which contains the value of the kerning of the characters.

properties.name: CharLocale
desc: contains the value of the locale.

properties.name: CharLocaleAsian
desc: contains the value of the locale.

properties.name: CharLocaleComplex
desc: contains the value of the locale.

properties.name: CharPosture
desc: This attribute contains the value of the posture of the document.

properties.name: CharPostureAsian
desc: This property contains the value of the posture of the document.

properties.name: CharPostureComplex
desc: This property contains the value of the posture of the document.

properties.name: CharRelief
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontRelief value of the text in the control.

properties.name: CharRotation
desc: determines the rotation of a character in degree.
Depending on the implementation only certain values may be allowed.

properties.name: CharScaleWidth
desc: determines the percentage value for scaling the width of characters.
The value refers to the original width which is denoted by 100, and it has to be greater than 0.

properties.name: CharShadowed
desc: specifies if the characters are formatted and displayed with a shadow effect.

properties.name: CharStrikeout
desc: determines the type of the strike out of the character.

properties.name: CharUnderline
desc: This attribute contains the value for the character underline.

properties.name: CharUnderlineColor
desc: specifies the text line color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: CharWeight
desc: This attribute contains the value of the font weight.

properties.name: CharWeightAsian
desc: This property contains the value of the font weight.

properties.name: CharWeightComplex
desc: This property contains the value of the font weight.

properties.name: CharWordMode
desc: If this attribute is TRUE, the underline and strike-through properties are not applied to white spaces.

properties.name: ControlBackground
desc: specifies the background color (RGB) of the control.

properties.name: ControlBackgroundTransparent
desc: determines if the background color is set to transparent.

properties.name: ControlTextEmphasis
desc: specifies the com.sun.star.text.FontEmphasis value of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontDescriptor
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontDescriptorAsian
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: FontDescriptorComplex
desc: specifies the font attributes of the text in the control.

properties.name: HyperLinkName
desc: contains the name of the hyperlink (if set).

properties.name: HyperLinkTarget
desc: contains the name of the target for a hyperlink (if set).

properties.name: HyperLinkURL
desc: contains the URL of a hyperlink (if set).

properties.name: ParaAdjust
desc: specifies the horizontal alignment of the text.

properties.name: UnvisitedCharStyleName
desc: contains the character style name for unvisited hyperlinks.

properties.name: VerticalAlign
desc: specifies the vertical alignment of the text in the control.

properties.name: VisitedCharStyleName
desc: contains the character style name for visited hyperlinks.
